name: Luxury Riverside Apartment
tagline: Stunning views of the city skyline
description: A beautifully designed apartment with floor-to-ceiling windows offering breathtaking views of the river and city. Perfect for families and business travelers alike.

name: Modern City Center Studio
tagline: Perfect for short stays and business trips
description: A compact yet comfortable studio located in the heart of the city. Close to major transport links and business districts.
